mapper.select: SELECT t.idx ,t.d_member_idx ,t.badge ,t.kid_type ,t.t_care_type ,t.schedule_day ,t.schedule_time ,t.t_cost ,t.t_introduce ,t.bank ,t.acnum ,t.cctvagree ,t.t_sexcrime ,t.career_experience ,m.name ,(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy') - to_char(m.birth,'yyyy')) as age ,m.gender ,r.idx as d_reserve_idx ,r.cost ,ci.c_imgpath ,rv.star ,rv.r_writedate ,rv.r_content FROM d_teachercard t LEFT JOIN d_member m ON m.idx = t.d_member_idx LEFT JOIN d_reserve r ON r.teacher_idx = t.d_member_idx LEFT JOIN d_common_img ci ON ci.d_member_idx = t.d_member_idx LEFT JOIN d_review rv ON rv.d_reserve_idx = r.idx WHERE t.d_member_idx = #{idx}
